oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maria von Trapp
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Events
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Maria von Trapp, of "Sound of Music" fame, signed autographs after her appearance at CBC's Auditorium in the Siena-Christian Brothers College Cultural Series for 1961-1962. Her lecture tour, "Around the WOrld with the Trapp Family Singers," was in relation to the Broadway success of the musical based on her memoirs.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
